about_the_game:
A free demo is now available! You can choose any of the eight protagonists, play for three hours, and carry over your saved game data to the full game. Travel beyond starting areas is restricted, but you can explore those corners of Solistia to your heart's content.

Will you strike out on a journey to recruit companions, face formidable foes in the dungeon depths, or simply enjoy the beauty of the world? Every road is yours to take.

Embark on an adventure all your own.
detailed_description:
A free demo is now available! You can choose any of the eight protagonists, play for three hours, and carry over your saved game data to the full game. Travel beyond starting areas is restricted, but you can explore those corners of Solistia to your heart's content.

Will you strike out on a journey to recruit companions, face formidable foes in the dungeon depths, or simply enjoy the beauty of the world? Every road is yours to take.

Embark on an adventure all your own.
legal_notice: © 2023 SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD. All Rights Reserved.
name: OCTOPATH TRAVELER II Prologue Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i3-6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 460 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS @ 1280x720, Preset "Low", 2GB VRAM required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 470 / Intel® Arc™ A750 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS @ 1920x1080, Preset "Highest", Systen RAM 16GB required when running on Intel GPU

short_description: A free demo is now available! You can play for three hours and carry over your saved game data to the full game. Travel beyond starting areas is restricted, but you can explore those corners of Solistia to your heart's content.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
